Articles.Content: WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be honest, this one scares us a little! Ensouensou created a mod that adds rattles, vibrations and stress sounds to your ship depending on how much thrust, gravitational and atmospheric forces your ship is enduring at any given time. The end result is a mod that drastically changes the experience of the in-vehicle point of view, giving you the feeling that things could go horribly wrong at any minute - and letÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s face it, they often do. More information in the [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114618](**FORUM THREAD**, and the download is available on [http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/229161-shipeffects-sound-mod](**CURSE**.

That's cool. I finally understand why they want to add camera shake.

For the longest time I kept thinking it was an April Fool's joke.

Happy landings!

That is awesome. I was hoping this is what Harvester meant by camera wobble, but I fear it is not. My only concern is if the landing sounds will conflict with CollisionFX's landing sounds.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T21:13:56Z" title="04/13/2015 09:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by Alshain**

> 
> That is awesome. I was hoping this is what Harvester meant by camera wobble, but I fear it is not. My only concern is if the landing sounds will conflict with CollisionFX's landing sounds.

The landing sounds are triggered by a sudden increase in Gee-Forces, so it doesn't conflict, but it does sound bad.
lmao this mod is awesome. I can imagine one of those kerbals thinking "I wish I had used the heavy duty duct tape instead of the scotch tape..." as the whole thing is shaking violently lol
I hope it sounds something like the stress sounds when Sidonia (Knights of Sidonia) had to pull emergency high G maneuvers....

That last sound where they stick the landing sounds really cool! .......that reminds me, I have to take the garbage cans to the curb in the morning. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I usually play 100% stock, but after seeing this video... I really wanto to get this mod !

(especially the re-entry sounds and the radio messages)

The radio messages are from another awesome mod called Chatterer.
don't forget there is also a simple config change to make this work in third person as well!
Some system alarms and beeps will really top this for me.

very nice. sounds will get tuned I imagine.

is there any video with sound of any kind of re entry? never seen any
